table.description: Deprecated. Admin-configurable properties for setting up the EHR.
Grouping of records across multiple datasets, associated with a particular data entry form
Request for service of some sort, such as a blood draw. Parent record for the associated dataset rows.
Configuration for the Animal History user interface, with each row representing one of the secondary level tabs

column.description: One of: js (a JavaScript function hung from the EHR.reports object), report (R report), or query

column.columnTitle: By Default, This Query Should Be Filtered To Show Today's Data

column.description: Optional, description to be presented to user along with report. Might indicate it's a work in progress, for example.

table.description: Observations associated with a whole cage, and not attributable to a single animal, from a specific date/time
Templates, tied to a specific data entry form, that users can use to pre-populate common sets of rows and values
Subscriptions to specific notification types, to be delivered via email, based on the notification's schedule
Deprecated. Configuration for ExtJS 3-based data entry forms
Dataset rows that are pre-filled (often only partially) within the context of a user-defined data entry template
Types of notifications for automated emails to be run on a scheduled basis
Deprecated. Configuration for ExtJS 3-based data entry forms
Limits for the number of animals approved for an IACUC protocol
IACUC protocol and project amendments and renewals
Additional EHR-specific information associated with the core.qcstate table
Relatedness of every animal to every other animal in the colony
Mapping of allowable procedures to IACUC protocols
Exemptions from normal requirements for individual IACUS (described in free text)

column.description: Schema Name To Be Used In Validation of Allowable Values
Query Name To Be Used In Validation of Allowable Values
The column in the target table that provides the list of alowable values
